subject: Nutrition
title: Celery Juice Craze
description: A quick win: understand Celery Juice Craze.

hook.text: A self-proclaimed Medical Medium claimed celery juice cures chronic illness. Millions believed him.

buildup.text: Celery is 95% water with small amounts of potassium and vitamin K. It's fine but unremarkable.

discovery.text: No peer-reviewed study has ever tested or supported celery juice as treatment for any disease.

twist.text: The Medical Medium claims his advice comes from a spirit entity. He has no medical credentials.

punchline.text: Spirit advice, zero science, lots of celery waste.
